name: Body Dungeon
description:
My take on the "Joined Together" theme for this jam.

Escape a dungeon while taking care of your failing body. Traverse a top down dungeon crawler while making sure to pump blood from your heart, breathe oxygen into your lungs, take care of your damaged legs and bandage your arms to hold your shield.

WASD - controls character

Mouse - To interact with the body parts

This isn't an endless dungeon, there is an escape.
